Pricing

Portrait Sessions

Portrait sessions are at the location of your choice in the Knoxville area. Photography sessions can be scheduled during the week after 5:30pm or with more flexibility on weekends. 

Portrait sessions include: 

  • High-resolution photos. 
  • Print release for unlimited printing, posting, and sharing. 

Sessions are $100 and usually take 1 hour but if we need a little more time that's perfectly fine. 

Contact me to book your portrait session!  

Weddings 

Please contact me to inquire about your wedding date and for more information on pricing and wedding packages. All packages are flexible to fit your wedding and the type of experience you are looking for. 

$700 – Photography Package #1 

  • 1 photographer 
  • 4 hour coverage All full size digital images on usb drive or cd $

$1000 – Photography Package #2

  • 2 photographers 
  • 8 hour coverage 
  •  All full size digital images on usb drive or cd 

$1500 – Photography Package #3 

  • 2 photographers 
  • Full day coverage A
  • ll full size digital images on usb drive or cd 
  • Engagement photo shoot Included – 1 hour
